product_name: Charlotte TilburyPillow Talk Big Lip Plumpgasm Plumping Lip Gloss
summary: SummaryPillow Talk Big Lip Plumpgasm is a plumping gloss with the hydrating comfort of a balm in Charlotte's iconic Pillow Talk! Plump+ hydrate your lips instantly and over time!
details: DetailsBenefitsPlumpingHigh Shine FinishHydratingWithout PhthalatesWithout ParabensInnovative heat + ice technology provides a burn-free, sting-free plumped-up pout in seconds!Feel the Plumpgasm sensation work its magic while hyaluronic acid + lip-loving ingredients hydrate and smooth for your juiciest lips ever! As you wear, your lips get plumper and smoother over time!Research ResultsLips look 93% plumper instantly!*Plumps natural lips by 25% in 2 weeks!***Clinical trial on 32 people.**Clinical trial on 32 people with twice daily applicationKey IngredientsHeat + Ice Technology - for a power plump effect without the sting!Plump Effect CO2LLAGENEER - for an instant + overtime plumping and smoothing effectHyaluronic Acid- for long-lasting hydrationItem 2619525How To UseThe precision application diamond tip applies the perfect amount to your lips for love at first swipe!IngredientsFair-Medium: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Didecene, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica Silylate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dicalcium Phosphate, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Ethyl Vanillin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Lupinus Albus Seed Extract, Capsicum Frutescens Resin, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Canola Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Stearates, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492), Blue 1 Lake (Ci‚ÄØ42090), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: The precision application diamond tip applies the perfect amount to your lips for love at first swipe!
ingredients: Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891)

reviews.headline: Overpriced lip gloss
reviews.comments: Bought it.....it was recommended by the sales person at ulta. There was no difference when applied on, it went on like any other lip gloss..I will not be buying this again.

reviews.headline: Leaks
reviews.comments: I love the product but it leaks out of the sides! It's frustrating because I can't carry it with me.

reviews.headline: What a mess!
reviews.comments: No matter how carefully and slowly you take the wand out you get way too much product and it ends up all over the threaded top of the tube. Yes, there's a tingle to the product, but it does nothing to plump. Really a disappointing product for tye price.

reviews.headline: My favorite daily lip gloss
reviews.comments: Started on CT last summer :) will repurchase - it has lasted ne and has been a daily / go to going out gloss for me

reviews.headline: I love this item
reviews.comments: Love this lip gloss makes your lips pop out and keeps them hydrated and beautifully glossed üòå

reviews.headline: Love ‚ù§Ô∏è
reviews.comments: So smooth and plumping!!!

As someone who is on a budget and is a Too faced lip plumper die hard‚Ä¶. dare i say i like this better ü´£. the packaging is super cute as it should be for the price. alot of lip plumpers ive tried smell super chemically and i cant stand it, the smell for this one is very much tolerable. instantly it plumped my lips and it lasted much longer than other brands. its a pretty hue of pinky-brown, but does sheer out slightly so it could work as a topper gloss but works great on bare lips aswell. i would buy it again in the future but its not really a NEED. good amount of product but i wish the applicator was more precise.

reviews.headline: Not worth the price
reviews.comments: I love this lipgloss. I love the color but its not worth it because the way the container that holds the product does not last at all. When you open it. No matter if you have it upside all the time. It always spills. The applicator takes so much product out and to put it back in. Is a mess. I bought one and i just thought it was a faulty bottle. But i just purchased another one only having it for two weeks. I was out. This new bottle does the same tbing

reviews.headline: Gloppy messy  applicator ! Good product
reviews.comments: I have loved everything I've purchased from charlotte Tilbury- but this is the worst applicator I've ever used. The tester in the store was a mess, with lip product all over the lip and side of the container. I thought it was due to customers sloppy use - nope. Even using care when removing the applicator, the suction causes a mess to come out. Too bad, because I like the lip product but not the method of dispensing it!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: This is second time have bought this item

reviews.headline: The BEST Nude Gloss
reviews.comments: Very nice packaging , & great applicator !

reviews.headline: It's nice
reviews.comments: I like the formula and I purchased it solely for the shade and because the Collagen Lip Baths are runny, streaky, and the applicator's awful. The sensation is really nice, the color performs so well I would recommend using it on its own rather than a topper.

reviews.headline: Overpriced and wasted most of the product
reviews.comments: This gloss is a beautiful color but it does not plump at all and even when its sealed completely the product comes out and leaks all over. Even when I started leaving it upright on the counter the product still seeped out. What a waste.

reviews.headline: High shine and plump all in one lip gloss
reviews.comments: First time trying the new Charlotte Tiilbury Big Lip Plumping gloss. I chose the darker shade that is so natural and pretty for the winter.  Although it's pricy for a gloss I will continue to buy.  The plumping effect is great and I like the tingle that it gives you.

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Absolutely buy. In both colors! I use it everyday! The downside is the packaging,  I have found a lot of product on the part where you close the container.

reviews.headline: rip off
reviews.comments: I purchased this, the gloss is nice but no plumping affect what so ever. complete rip off.

reviews.headline: not good
reviews.comments: color is pretty but no tingle no plumping. Would not recommend.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love it. It does have a kick to it though - you can definitely feel it working on plumping your lips.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: Way better than two faced

reviews.headline: my favorite lip gloss ever !!!!!
reviews.comments: i literally love this lip gloss i wear the love trap lip liner with the fair/medium gloss & it is the cutest everyday combo & its so plumping & hydrating i love it!!!!

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Charlotte Tilbury Lip Plumper gloss in the shade 'pillow talk' has quickly become a staple in my makeup collection. I have tried many lip plumpers in the past that have done nothing, but I have to say, Charlotte Tilbury knocked this one out the park! 

First off, upon opening, it is a beautiful & uniquely made, high-quality packaging, with a cute lips logo on there. The application is also perfect, providing just the right amount of product without being too messy.  The gloss has a smooth and creamy texture that glides on effortlessly, making it perfect for everyday wear. The color is a gorgeous muted rosy nude that complements my skin tone perfectly. I immediately felt a tingling sensation on my lips. It wasn't uncomfortable, but rather a subtle plumping sensation. I could see a noticeable difference in the fullness of my lips within minutes. 

What I love most about this lip plumping gloss is that it not only enhances my natural lip shape, but it also adds a hint of fullness and volume. It's like a non-invasive lip filler in a tube! One of the main ingredients in this gloss is hyaluronic acid, which is known for its hydrating and plumping properties. I have also noticed that my lips feel more moisturized and smoother after using this product. I have received many compliments on my lips since using this gloss.

The best part is that it doesn't dry out my lips like some other plumping products do. Instead, it leaves them feeling hydrated and nourished thanks to the nourishing ingredients such as coconut oil and shea butter. 

Additionally, I also appreciate that it is cruelty-free and made with natural ingredients, which is a huge plus for me. 

The only downside to this product is that it is a bit on the pricier side, but I believe it is worth the investment. A little goes a long way and the results make it worth the price.

In conclusion, I highly recommend this lip plumping gloss to anyone looking for fuller and more hydrated lips. I have received countless compliments on my lips since using this product and I can confidently say that it has become a must-have in my daily makeup routine. Plus, the sleek and elegant packaging makes it a chic addition to my makeup collection. It's by far the nicest gloss packaging I have ever owned. Overall, the Charlotte Tilbury Lip Plumper gloss in pillow talk has exceeded all of my expectations and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for fuller, more luscious lips. I was sent this product complimentary in exchange of my honest review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Exceeded expectations!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm going to preface this review by saying I'm not really a traditional lip gloss person. I like to layer glosses over lipstick but I'm very picky with the consistency. The gooey, thick glosses are not my taste but I know some like it. Having said that, there are definite pros and cons to this Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Big Lip Plumpgasm Plumping Lip Gloss. I think the name in and of itself is way too long and descriptive but that's just me being picky. On the plus side, the presentation is gorgeous. It's a very substantial, big tube with a creative flair and you can actually see the color from the see through "window" which is nice. The doe tip applicator is perfectly balanced and big enough to swipe a large area. There is a lot of product that comes out when you lift the wand however; a little too much in my opinion. Since this is a lip plumping gloss, you do get a cooling, almost minty fresh effect. It's not overly tingly or uncomfortable like other lip plumpers. As with all plumpers, this gives the illusion of bigger lips using optical enhancers and light reflecting pigment. Your lips don't actually get bigger unfortunately. The scent is amazing; like a luxurious, sweet cotton candy. Even though this is a gooey gloss, it does have staying power which surprised me. I wore this for hours without touch ups. I did wear a nude lip liner as I do with every lip product. I'm wearing the Fair-Medium version. This was just okay for me. I don't think it's something I would run out and buy but I'm thankful I got to try it out.
faceoff_negative.headline: Beautiful Packaging
